short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyzes images using multimodal LLM and generates detailed prompts to create similar images

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension automatically generates text prompts for creating images similar to those found on websites. It's a convenient tool for users of AI image generation platforms, allowing them to quickly create creative prompts based on images. By eliminating the need to come up with prompts from scratch, it enables more efficient AI image generation. Since it can be used with images from any website, the possibilities for inspiration are endless.
